headline: Royal Caribbean Declares Dividend and Announces New $2 Billion Share Repurchase Program
summary: The Board of Directors of Royal Caribbean Group (NYSE: RCL) today declared a quarterly dividend of $1.00 per common share payable on January 14, 2026 to shareholders of record at the close of business on December 26, 2025.

headline: Does NCLH's 20% Booking Surge Signal Stronger Consumer Demand in 2026?
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line's broad booking surge, rising load factors and new destination upgrades hint at strengthening cruise demand heading into 2026.

headline: Is Royal Caribbean (RCL) Using Its 2027–28 Caribbean Expansion To Deepen Loyalty or Stretch Capacity?
summary: Royal Caribbean recently unveiled an expanded 2027–28 Caribbean lineup featuring 13 ships and a mix of 3- to 9-night itineraries to destinations such as Perfect Day at CocoCay, Royal Beach Clubs, Cozumel, and ports in the Dominican Republic, with early access bookings opening for Crown & Anchor Society members on December 9, 2025. Set against recent weather-related disruptions and renewed analyst attention, this forward-focused itinerary expansion highlights how the company is leaning on new...
